snippet: Despite the absence of Mike Trout, the coaches and managers charged with identifying the best fielders at each position got things mostly right this season.
abstract: Keeping Score column notes that despite absence of Los Angeles Angels outfielder Mike Trout, coaches and managers charged with identifying best fielders at each position in MLB got things mostly right this season; chart lists Gold Glove and Fielding Bible Award recipients.
lead_paragraph: Despite the absence of Mike Trout, the coaches and managers charged with identifying the best fielders at each position got things mostly right this season.

headline.main: Gold Glove Listing Improves but Still Has a Major Absence
headline.print_headline: Gold Glove Listing Improves but Still Has a Major Absence
